title: Tudore Tranquility
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Organic, Catering, Fusion
description: Est. Aug 2015, Tudore Tranquility, located in a residential area near Yoyogi Park, is the one of the first restaurants in Tokyo offering high-end plant based cuisine. The exquisitely arranged are infused with intricate mixture of flavors, created through the use of herbs and spices that complement each other. Soft lighting, soothing music, and abstract art combine to create a subtle, elegant, and tranquil atmosphere. The ever-changing 8-course dinner features palate cleansers, naturally sweetened fruit and vegetable based desserts, and original cocktails. Handpicked wines accompany each of the individually plated dishes. A 5-course brunch is served on Sunday. Private parties for minimum 15 guests can be accommodated.
